Primary Executive: Brian Reardon, Chief Administrative Officer; Email: brian.reardon@cord.bc.ca
Alternate Executive: Marilyn Rilkoff, Director of Financial Services; Email: marilyn.rilkoff@cord.bc.ca
Service Details: - Provides services for the Regional District of Central Okanagan: environmental services; bylaw enforcement including dog control, noxious weeds and insects; waste reduction and solid waste management; planning, building inspections, permits and business licences (for the regional district only); dog licences; Victim Services; Crime Stoppers; False Alarm reduction program; mapping/GIS; Economic Development Commission; regional parks; and now offering online bill payment at www.regionaldistrict.com/payments- All dog licences in the Central Okanagan expire December 31 in every calendar year and must be renewed before February 28 the following year: Fixed: $20, Not Fixed: $60; owners of unlicenced dogs may be subject to a fine of up to $300
Meetings: Regional Board meets the fourth Monday of each month, 7pm * Governance and Services Committee meets the second Thursday of each month, 8:30am * A Regional Board meeting is held following the Governance and Services Committee meeting to rise and report
Address & Map: 1450 KLO RdKelowna, BC     V1W 3Z4View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: KLO Rd and St Amand Rd
